frontMatter.title: Masonite Sentry
frontMatter.summary: Sentry SDK implementation for Masonite Apps.

prev.title: Masonite Permission
prev.summary: Associate users with roles and permissions.

next.title: Masonite Multitenancy
next.summary: Multitenancy is a feature that allows you to have multiple tenants in your application. This is useful for things like a company having multiple websites, or a company having multiple apps.
